meanings.definition: Relating to the number seven or a division into seven parts.
meanings.sent1: The calendar shows a septimal pattern with seven days in a week.
meanings.sent2: The group decided to divide the tasks into a septimal structure for better organization.
meanings.sent3: It was a septimal coincidence that they all arrived at the same time.
meanings.sent4: Her septimal mind could easily grasp the concept of dividing things into seven equal parts.
meanings.sent5: The septimal garden had seven different sections, each with its unique plants.

meanings.definition: A musical interval that is the seventh part of an octave.
meanings.sent1: The musician played a beautiful septimal note on the piano.
meanings.sent2: In music theory, the septimal is an essential interval for creating harmonies.
meanings.sent3: The orchestra conductor jokingly called for more septimal notes to add a unique twist to the melody.
meanings.sent4: The septimal in the song resonated deeply with the audience, creating a sense of completeness.
meanings.sent5: The composer carefully inserted a septimal pause to build tension before the grand finale.
